name: GD01 Clash of Bears
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is a small in-class project from our Scripting for Games course, NOT a serious game!!! Play at your own risk, and expect some bugs.

1) Remember your world-name, that's how you can load the same world again later
2) By creating buildings, you will give any attacker more coins to attack your world
3) Rotate the camera with Q & E. Place multiple buildings with shift.
4) Have fun! :D

Made by LCEA GD01:

http://thecea.ca
